name: PANDEMIC CAMPED IN
description: What would be the perfect anagram from the word PANDEMIC? I would argue CAMPED IN would be fitting for this dubious honor. We all went through the mandatory lockdowns and the endless death news cycle; the whole gambit; a real Rubicon. For some, the lockdown was a never-ending solitude that made extroverts freak out and yearn for contact and conversation. For some introverts, it was a chance to reinvent themselves, learn a new trade, envision their futures manifest. What did you do during your lockdown time? Did you try something new in your life? Read more? Started to cook or bake? Took up painting? Learned guitar? Wrote a book? Got a pet? Got a 2nd or 3rd job? Became unemployed? Lost someone? Got COVID?
